title: Develop a Monthly Content Calendar
description: A content strategist needs to plan the content (blog posts, social media themes) for the upcoming month.

tasks.description: Identify key dates, holidays, or company events for the month.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent lists all relevant dates that could inspire content.

tasks.description: Brainstorm content themes for each week of the month.
Populate a calendar with specific content titles and formats (e.g., Blog Post, Video, Infographic) for each day.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed schedule of content to be created.
